casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry Alvin HYATT. No. 402A00-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 14, 2006. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Chapel Hill, for Terry Alvin Hyatt. *294Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of July 2006 by Defendant for Unopposed Motion for Extension of Time to File Supplemental Pleading:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of July 2006."
